definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: ransom; ´[[פ]] Ps 111:9 + 2 t.; [[פְּדֻת]] Ex 8:19; —fr. exile Is 50:2; fr. iniquities Ps 130:7; in gen. Ps 111:9, [[שֵׂמְתִּי פְדֻת בֵּין עַמִּי וּבֵין עַמְֶָּ]] Ex 8:19 I will set a ransom (distinguishing) between my people and thy people Targum, but improb. and text dub.; LXX SyrVer Vulgate set a distinction (rdg. what ?).
